Global Variable# BNNSActivationFunctionAbs

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOSwatchOS 3.0+

```
var BNNSActivationFunctionAbs: BNNSActivationFunction
```

BNNSActivationFunctionGELUApproximation2: BNNSActivationFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsactivationfunctiongeluapproximation2)An activation function that provides a fast evaluation of the
